Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes by the county of Albany
Summary: Relates to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes by the county of Albany; extends authorization for such tax until 11/30/2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes by the county of Albany
